summary: Changes top highest destruction level perks so they are not so game destroying
descriptionHtml:
If you like me have mods that make Mobs have resist vs elements you have found you self up the river with out a paddle.

IE
some mobs in game are immune to fire so if you have pyromancy contract you are screwed :)

this makes all 3 lines obtainable as well as makes them a bit more balanced

exact changes are
like this
---
Burning Heart
Fire spells you cast are 10% stronger and incoming fire spells are 5% weaker.(you can get frost and shock as well)

Fire spells you cast are 25% stronger and 10% cheaper. Your fire resistance grows by 50%. frost or shock spells are 15% weaker and you are 25% weaker to those elements as well.
---
I have changed all 6 perks in like manner.

(note sadly this replaces skyRe's main esp so you must use SkyRe_1301)
author: LordMaddog
